summary: THERE WERE PROBLEMS WITH THE AUTOMATIC TRANSMISSION.  WHILE DRIVING THE VEHICLE, THE CONSUMER STATED THAT IT FELT LIKE SOMEBODY HIT THE BOTTOM OF THE TRUCK WITH A HAMMER AND THE BACK TIRES LOCKED UP.  THE VEHICLE HAD SLID ACROSS THE ROAD.  THE MANUFACTURE HAD BEEN CONTACTED VIA  E-MAIL AND HAS NOT RESPONDED.  TS  SCC
